div.div: Lunch pickups are 11:00 am Monday through Friday at the High School!

br.p: The Brimfield CUSD #309 Board of Education will be holding two Special Board Meetings. Meeting dates are Tuesday, April 28, 2020, and Tuesday, May 5, 2020. There is also an Extra-Curricular Committee Meeting scheduled for April 30, 2020.
If you are interested in participating in Cheer in the 2020-2021 season, please fill out the attached form

Due to the current pandemic crisis we have decided to postpone the drawing / dance to July 18th, location and times will be the same.
Tickets are still available!!!
Click the link for information online music learning
Our Kindergarten Roundup that was scheduled for April 2nd has been postponed. We have further information later! Thanks for your understanding.
